sentences.sContent: "I suppose so," said Anna with a shrug.
sentences.sCn: “我想是这样，”安娜耸耸肩说道。

phrases.pCn: 摆脱；抖去；不屑理睬；耸肩表示蔑视；扭身脱掉衣服

remMethod.val: shru(看作拼音shu， 舒) + g(音似： 胳) → 舒展舒展胳膊 → 耸肩

trans.tranOther: a movement of your shoulders upwards and then downwards again that you make to show that you do not know something or do not care about something
